ProductInfo.Features:
Android 4.2.1 with 1.5GHz MTK6589T, Cortex A7 Quad-core processor and 2GB RAM + 32GB ROM
Support 2G network: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz & Support 3G network: WCDMA 850/2100MHz
Dual SIM Card(one Micro SIM card) Dual Standby, both of the two SIM card slots can support GSM and WCDMA
5.0 inch large 5-point-touch Original SHARP SLCD capacitive screen with 1920 x 1080 pixels FHD screen resolution, 16000K Colors
13.0MP High definition back camera with Auto Focus and flashlight, Front 8.0MP camera, make your selfies more distinctive
ProductInfo.Name: Zopo ZP980 HD 1080P 5.0 Inch Unlocked 3G Dual SIM Quad Core Phone with Dual Standby 2G RAM 32G ROM 13.0MP Camera
